name: A Chase in Rainsville
description:
It's a quiet, relaxing day in Rainsville... Or so it seems. Your cooking pot has suddenly grown legs and ran away! It's up to you to catch it before it causes more trouble! A little visual novel with 4 different endings.

A Chase in Rainsville was made in 2ish weeks for My First Game Jam! My first time using Ren'Py and it was a fun learning experience! It's also a little preview/test for a future game I'd like to do~

Game Changelog

Version 1.1 on Jan. 17, 2016, 10pm

  • All background music loops now
  • In-game menu easier to see
  • Typo and grammar fixes
  • Slight script updates

Version 1.0 on Jan. 17, 2016, 12pm

  • Game released!
